ygData.subject: quick quest question
ygData.msgSnippet: When I go to the Temple of Sol Ro to get my caduceus, I have all the pieces... I understand that I need 2 bars of magnetized platinum. I understand that
ygData.messageBody:
When I go to the Temple of Sol Ro to get my caduceus, I have all the
pieces... I understand that I need 2 bars of "magnetized" platinum.
I understand that someone there can "magnetize" them for me. Do they
also need to be enchanted before I go there, or not? If so, is there
someone in the temple that can enchant them, or do I need to find a
high level enchanter to do it?

______________________________________________________
